title: 20 MINUTE Low Priority Que for one leave.

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Despite the title, this isn't my only leave ever. I have been playing for years, I have previously got warnings about AFK and even got a 10 minute leaver buster ban ages ago. 

then I had a power outtage, reconnect and the team has surrendered and I get a leave and 20 minute ban. Check my history, I haven't had a leave in a game for 100+ games. My last leaver buster was months ago.

Stupid automated leaverbuster - Riot, Show me every game I've afk'd according to leaver buster because it is bullshit.

replies.body: you still dc'd though and your team ended up suffering because of it.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QpJenQkw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-20T09:36:18.997+0000)
>
> you still dc'd though and your team ended up suffering because of it.

^This, just because it isn't your fault doesn't mean you didn't make 4 other people miserable. Besides there is literally no way to get the system to work so that it excuses accidents because accidents can be staged, if they made it so DC from internet/power cutout didn't punish you everyone would just unplug their PC/Internet to leave without repercussion.

.... the system is still too harsh.

The main thing here being that I DC'd one rank game, out of hundreds.... the leaverbuster FAQ says you can get low priority que for leaving only one game. 

So that's still shit.
